events.message: I received the wrong size for my order and would like to request a refund. The product doesn't fit and it's disappointing.
The case has been categorized under Refund since the customer is requesting a refund for the incorrect item size received.
Assigning this refund request to the returns specialist for further assistance and resolution.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I understand you want a refund due to the wrong size received, and I'm here to help you with that.
Could you please provide your order number and send us a photo of the product showing the size label to help us verify your claim?
Here is the order number 45891234 and attached is the photo of the product with the size label clearly showing it is not what I ordered.
Thank you for the information. We will authorize a full refund and arrange a free return shipping label for you to send the incorrect item back.
Thanks for the quick response! I appreciate the refund and return label offer. That resolves my issue perfectly.
The refund has been processed and the return shipping label sent to your email. Please let us know if you need further help.
Just following up to ensure you received the refund and everything else is satisfactory with your order resolution.
Since your refund was successfully received and no further issues were reported, we are closing this case now. Thank you!
We have sent a satisfaction survey to your email. Please take a moment to share your experience with our support team.
